about_the_game:
Stubbs is the captain of the crew, and a seasoned diver. He unfortunately lost his hand to a great white, but now that he's outfitted with a robotic hand, it looks like he's ready to get back in the water.

Includes:
  • Diver Skin: Captain Stubbs
  • Revolver Skin: Scrimshaw
detailed_description:
Stubbs is the captain of the crew, and a seasoned diver. He unfortunately lost his hand to a great white, but now that he's outfitted with a robotic hand, it looks like he's ready to get back in the water.

Includes:
  • Diver Skin: Captain Stubbs
  • Revolver Skin: Scrimshaw

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista and above
  • Processor: Intel 2.4 GHz or AMD Athlon 2.6 GHz (dual-core required)
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ATI Radeon 4870/5770/6770 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 260/460/550 Ti
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and above
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 or AMD Phenom II X4 940 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon 7870/R9 270 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti/760
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Supported Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gaming mouse

pegi.descriptors:
